alert.note: Alert for Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 1:01PM PST until December 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches in the Treasure Valley and Malheur County, except up to 3 inches along the foothills. Elsewhere, total accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. More snow is expected this weekend, which could mix with snow in the lower valleys. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
